overview: Mark Lowry’s brand new project is a laid back, relaxed, living room feel … presenting several of Mark’s favorite songs with some of his favorite friends.  Also featuring Stan Whitmire, Sisters, Michael Lord, Amber Balltzglier, and Beverly “Mama” Lowry.  SONGLIST:  01) House of Gold 02) Going Home 03) Promises 04) I’ve Never Been Out of His Care 05) Nothing to Prove 06) I’m Gonna Make It 07) Untitled Hymn (Come to Jesus) 08) In the Garden
title: Mark Lowry: Unplugged & Unplanned
